colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI THUB PA CHEN PO BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI BSRUNG BZLOG GSANG GSUm GYI NYAL CHOG 'DI YAR NGO'I TSE NYER DRUG ,MAR NGO'I TSES DGU BCU DGU NYER DGU NYIN, ,BA 'DON DU BYAS PA'I GRANGS NI BDUN RNAM BCU BZHI NYER GCIG BRJOD NA LUS NGAG YID GSUm GYI BSRUNG BA DANG, ,'GAL RKYEN PHYI NANG GI BAR CHAD SDANG DGRA PHYOGS NGAN PA THAMS CAD PHYIR BZLOG PA DANG, TSE DANG BSOD NAMS DBANG THANG 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR RO, ,BAN STON BON STON GIS MTHUS BSGRUB CING BDE BAR NYAL NYAL CHOG GO ,'GRO BA THAMS CAD LA DGE BAR GYUR CIG ,DE NAS BYAS PA'I ZLA BA'I DRUG DUG DANG DGU DGU LA BYAS PA NA BYIN RLABS CHEN POR 'GYUR RO,, MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
